current.name: Legacy Insider

requirements.requirement: Granted to players who played with or against 343 Industries employees during an official event.

Prisoner
Ice Fields
Gephyrophobia
Lockout
Containment
Narrows
Snowbound
Valhalla
Avalanche
Blackout
Longbow

ONI: Sword Base
The Package.

Between February 13 and February 28 in 2019, complete ten games in multi-team OR complete three unique campaign missions in co-op. Cinematic-only missions, Spartan Ops missions, and Halo 3: ODSTs Mombasa Streets were excluded.
Between February 12 and February 18 in 2020, complete 10 matchmade games in any Social or Ranked 2v2 playlist or Firefight Doubles.
Between February 11 and February 14 in 2021 (Valentine's Day weekend), log into Halo: The Master Chief Collection.
Between April 3 and April 24 in 2019, complete seven matches in 'The Yappening' Social Games in 4v4/8v8.
Between May 27 and June 12 in 2020, complete seven matches in 'The Yappening' game category.
Between April 3 and April 24 in 2019, defeat 250 Unggoy with headshots in Campaign/Spartan Ops on Heroic or Higher.
Between May 27 and June 12 in 2020, defeat 150 Unggoy with headshots throughout MCC (in Campaign, Spartan Ops, Firefight, or Custom Firefight).
Between October 17 and 31 in 2018, play Infection or complete the Flooded campaign playlist.
Between October 1 and 31 in 2019, complete 10 matches of Infection in Social Matchmaking.
